PluginData.Author: StarCpt
PluginData.Tooltip: Now with 100% more sprites and cameralcd.
PluginData.Description: Spiritual successor to HudLcd. Features: - Same config format as the original mod - Sprite support! Screens in script mode will draw the displayed script on hud - CameraLCD Remastered compatibility - Better performance (3-4x in tests) - Multi-screen block support. Any blocks with lcd screens are supported
